General.Name: Harson Trading China Co Ltd
General.Description: Harson Trading (China) Co.,Ltd. engages in the design, development, production, and wholesale of leather products in China and internationally. It offers shoes, bags, clothing products, and accessories. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Kunshan, China. Harson Trading (China) Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Zhenxing International Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Caoan Economic and Technological Dev Zne, Kunshan, China, 215332
